listener

enabled

private static boolean enabled
This variable is true if this class has been used to create an SSL socket since JVM startup. We use this as a proxy for whether or not we are communicating with the Ganymede server in SSL mode.

private transient javax.net.ssl.SSLSocketFactory sf

setSSLClientListener

public static void setSSLClientListener(RMISSLClientListener listener)

This static method is used to register an optional listener on the Ganymede client, to receive notification when an RMI SSL socket is opened.
